name: Maggie's Moon Pies
description: Come to another planet with a taste of Maggie's Moon Pies! Born and raised in Midlothian, VA, Maggie grew up making moon pies every summer for the local bake sale. A delicious combination of chocolate, graham cookies, and marshmallow fluff, what's not to love about Maggie's Moon Pies? Try our flavor of the season: Winter Melon Moonlight!
hours:
10:30AM - 6PM Monday through Thursday {'
'}10:30AM - 9PM Friday through Saturday {'
'}CLOSED Sunday
menu: FULL MOON - our classic graham, chocolate, marshmallow moon pie. $6
VENUS VANILLA - vanilla flavored marshmallow fluff, matcha graham crackers, white chocolate. $7.50
STRAWBERRY SATURN - strawberry flavored marshmallow fluff, golden graham crackers, white chocolate with freeze dried strawberries. $7.50
DARK SIDE OF THE MOON - chocolate flavored marshmallow fluff, dark chocolate graham crackers, dark chocolate with white chocolate drizzle. $7
MATCHA ON MARS - matcha flavored marshmallow fluff, matcha graham crackers, matcha-infused white chocolate. $8
PUP ALDRIN - a cup of whipped cream with a crescent dog treat. $0

name: Far Out Bar
description: Far Out Bar is Richmond's premiere space-themed bar and grill. Taste your way through the galaxy with our small plate menu, extensive drink options, and an atmosphere that might take your breath away! Our Happy Hour is every weekday from 4-7pm.
hours:
11AM - 9:30PM Sunday through Thursday {'
'}11AM - 12AM Friday through Saturday
menu: SPACECRAFT WINGS - 8 crispy chicken wings tossed in honey mustard sriracha sauce, served with a side of cucumbers and bleu cheese or ranch dressing. $12
SIGNS OF VEGETATION - celery, carrots, bell peppers,, and cucumbers cut into matchsticks and served with a side of saffron garlic hummus. $9
ASTEROIDS AHEAD - half flaky salt half cinnamon sugar pretzel bites, served with sweet donut glaze and cheddar melted cheese dip. $10
THE MOON IS CHEESE - 6 deep-fried mozzarella sticks, served with marinara and pesto. $8
PURPLE PICKLE EATER - purple fried pickle coins with house ranch and chipotle mayo. $8
Come in to check out our drink menu!

name: Estella's
description: Enjoy an evening under the stars with Estella's Italian Cuisine. With our candlelit views of the Richmond City skyline, you're bound to be in for a night to remember. Join us for our monthly wine tasting events every third Wednesday of the month!
hours:
12PM - 10PM Monday through Thursday {'
'}12PM - 2AM Friday through Sunday
menu: Tagliatelle Bolognese - handmade tagliatelle noodles covered in rich bolognese sauce and topped with parmigiano reggiano. $18
Pesto Cavatappi - fresh basil pesto made with pine nuts and parmesan tossed with cavatappi noodles and garnished with sun-dried tomatoes. $19
Chicken Parmeson - parmesan crusted lemon chicken breast baked with spaghetti, marinara, and mozzarella. $20
Salmon Risotto - creamy chipotle risotto with spinach, red peppers, and grilled salmon. $20
Ratatouille - thin layers of tomato, eggplant, zucchini, and squash stewed in a rich garlic vegetable sauce. $18
Come in to check out our drink menu!

name: At The End of the Universe
description: Where do you find the best tacos in RVA? Only At The End of the Universe! Join us at the collaboration sister restaurant from the owners of Estella's and Far Out Bar! Indulge in a variety of dishes inspired from Tex Mex and Southeast Asian flavors. You won't want to trek home after you've tasted these tacos!
hours:
11AM - 9PM Tuesday through Thursday {'
'}11AM - 12AM Friday through Sunday {'
'}CLOSED Monday
menu: Pozole - hominy stew with beans, choose from blanco, verde, or rojo. $6
Arroz Caldo - chicken and rice stewed in bone broth and fish sauce, garnished with green onions and ginger. $6
Chicken Adobo Tacos - chicken braised in soy sauce, black vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, and peppercorns. Served with white rice and house pico de gallo. Corn or flour tortillas available. $15
Ropa Vieja Tacos - shredded flank steak stewed in tomato sauce. Served with yellow rice and black beans. Corn or flour tortillas available. $15
Calamansi Shrimp Tacos - grilled shrimp, calamansi, cilantro, and arugula. Served with brown rice and house pico de gallo. Corn or flour tortillas available. $14
Pineapple Potato Tacos - grilled pineapple, potatoes, and zucchini with lime crema. Served with white rice and house pico de gallo. Corn or flour tortillas available. $14
